description:
HOW TO PLAY!

"Q" Hold to turn off your flashlight!

"W"A"S"D" MOVE

"Mouse" move darkness effect!

"Space" JUMP!!!!

Bugs will be fixed soon!!!

Sorry if I don't speak English very well, I'm using the google translator to make it as formal as possible! (I speak Spanish) If you see the trapped soul you should not point your flashlight at it because it will scare you, if it touches you it will be the same, scare, scare and scare... Green is acid, you don't have to touch it, thanks for reading!
